snippet: Taking responsibility for a roof leak; a bank loan for capital repairs; lender says no to co-op sublet; next time, don’t forget the key.
abstract: Real Estate Q&A on New York City real estate laws and guidelines governing responsibility for co-op maintenance and sublets, capital repairs in condominiums and 'lockout fees' charged by some landlords.
lead_paragraph: Taking responsibility for a roof leak; a bank loan for capital repairs; lender says no to co-op sublet; next time, don’t forget the key.

headline.seo: New York Real Estate Question & Answer
